ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound sliced bacon, cut in half

cookingTips: Mix softened cream cheese with chopped green onions for a flavorful filling
Fill mushroom caps generously with mixture before wrapping each with bacon
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until bacon is crispy and mushrooms are tender
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Explain the importance of removing mushroom stems and help the user understand the filling consistency needed.
